00014 {

00019 /*
00020  *
00021  *
00022  */
00023 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00024 {
00025     struct Device *hd;
00026     struct Volume *vol;
00027     FILE* boot;
00028     unsigned char bootcode[1024];
00029  
00030     adfEnvInitDefault();
00031 
00032 //  adfSetEnvFct(0,0,MyVer,0);
00033 
00034     /* mount existing device */
00035     hd = adfMountDev( argv[1],FALSE );
00036     if (!hd) {
00037         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount device\n");
00038         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00039     }
00040 
00041     vol = adfMount(hd, 0, FALSE);
00042     if (!vol) {
00043         adfUnMountDev(hd);
00044         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount volume\n");
00045         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00046     }
00047 
00048     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00049 
00050     adfUnMount(vol);
00051     adfUnMountDev(hd);
00052 
00053     putchar('\n');
00054 
00055     /* create and mount one device */
00056     hd = adfCreateDumpDevice("newdev", 80, 2, 11);
00057     if (!hd) {
00058         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount device\n");
00059         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00060     }
00061     
00062     adfDeviceInfo(hd);
00063     
00064     adfCreateFlop( hd, "empty", FSMASK_FFS|FSMASK_DIRCACHE );
00065 
00066     vol = adfMount(hd, 0, FALSE);
00067     if (!vol) {
00068         adfUnMountDev(hd);
00069         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount volume\n");
00070         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00071     }
00072 
00073     boot=fopen(argv[2],"rb");
00074     if (!boot) {
00075         adfUnMountDev(hd);
00076         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount volume\n");
00077         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00078     }
00079     fread(bootcode, sizeof(unsigned char), 1024, boot);
00080     adfInstallBootBlock(vol, bootcode);
00081     fclose(boot);
00082 
00083     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00084 
00085     adfUnMount(vol);
00086     adfUnMountDev(hd);
00087 
00088     adfEnvCleanUp();
00089 
00090     return 0;
00091 }
